yoyo evry1 jst same ole same ole workin n shit but went 2 2 partys at wknd 1 was gd up untill dowzy got his head split open frm a glass table was blood evry wer man :O:O:O:O lol the 2nd 1 was funni casue ther was a guy a saw snortin coke lol n he was para lol so me n ma m8 had an explosive fag n we wer tryin 2 give him it n he was freakin out n almost cryin lmfao this guy was bout 23 lol was a gd nite a got totally smashed so it was brill :D:D:D:D

ne way that was ma wknd lol was pretty gd 

am off for now cyas soon

yo yo yo how b it goins? soz a aint done this in a while cause a cnt b assed lol ne way aint been up 2 much over the week but as it got 2 the weekend was pure wrecked evryday stayed at woodys on wed n got a drink n toke up ther twas class! friday was at daves again n wullie came dwn wiv fires n they had grass :D:D:D:D so had sum o that n we ended up playin a game wiv a ball that was funny as feck cause we was mashed :D n then sat was at marcs n got mashed again wiv evry1 but stu had the weed ;) lol ( berrie n marc shared a bed that nite wiv no1 in the room ;) ;) sexy time ) erm sunday went 2 marks n a got pretty stonned n jumped a wall :S cut both ma ars 2 fook :'( but it was funny cause lots of ppl was in histericks for bout 20mins straight lol n 2day a went 4 a drive in ma new/old pug 106 ;) ooooolll rriittee ;) ne hoo tis gettin l8 n ma hands are sore frm typin am out

audios!!! peace for now xxxx

hey mofos a done nout much last week but work :(! friday a 4get wat a done man :S:S:S:S lol brb need 2 think wat a done lol............(av actually spent at least 20mins thinkin bout wat a done on friday)cnt think man so lets say i.....:S a dunno ther was no friday lol! saturday The Scruffs played fury murrys over 18s in glasgow twas well gd man! after the gig me woody n marc stayed for the club n had a few beers n then went home,wen a got home a went in2 ma bed n got a fone call frm a guyfrm work sayin "anton man fukin minted show(he was at the gig)do u wanna come out n party till dawn" so am lyin in ma bed n a said aye man sounds gd lol! a had no way of gettin a taxi so a left the house at bout 2 to get a taxi in2 paisley lol! went 2 a party got stonned :D then went bak 2 the guy frm works gfs house n listened 2 motley crue n got even stonnder :) twas good!!! n sunday a wer 2 a lourdes meetin in port glasgow n then came home n went 2 bed :D yusssssss in fact im tired am gna go 2 bed soon ne way 

a knw rachel is readin this so gd rachel xxxxxxxxx lol 
n gd nite 2 evry1 else who is readin it 2 lol ciao 

 xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx

am off so i'll cyas all l8rz mibi

wnt a 1st got then it seemed livly wit pure pillow fights n stuff lol but felt awkward by beein the only boy out of like 9 ppl lol but stu colin berrin n rossko came up lol so all was gd (am nt tryin 2 call berrie a boy..althought she mite b foolin me..koko*hugs*)a was rollin a few wit stu in the bog n then went n comforted rachel..lets jst say a was holdin her hair bak for her lol!a then carried her 2 her bad n kept an eye on her for a bit..how loving am i :D lol!!sunday a helped clean up n look out in the street for her cat that was under her bed the hole time lol we ended up fallin asleep again as we wer knakered n a didn't get home till bout 10ish lol..monday went 2 work...joy!! lol...thats prety much wats been goin on since now lol
